title: Dr. Myron Rolle Interview: From pro football to helping fight against COVID-19
description:
Sports often intersect with real life and that's especially true in the case of Dr. Myron Rolle. In this special episode of the Pick Six podcast, the former top recruit and NFL safety turned neurosurgery resident, discusses his role on the frontlines fighting the coronavirus pandemic. Rolle talks about how his life has changed in the last month, adapting to help battle COVID-19, what people should and shouldn't be doing right now and how football compares to his current situation. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @MyronRolle
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
